channel.title: Server or Client?
channel.description:
Hi, I downloaded the first download at the top of the page in the server downloads section and I'm not sure what it is if it's a client or server and I'm sure there is more because i can't even make a shop or global object?
Could anyone please help me?

item.title: Server or Client?
item.dc:creator: @Tension_Ltd Tension Ltd
item.description:
@Tension_Ltd wrote:

If you can’ make a shop then it would be the client

  • Tension Ltd

Read full topic
